author: Owen Phillips
description: The best way to beat LeBron James is to hope he stays home, and he never stays home.
title: LeBron James Is Indestructible

author: Brian WindhorstESPN Senior Writer
description: The Cavaliers saw their 13-game postseason win streak snapped against the Boston Celtics in one of LeBron James' worst playoff games in years.
title: Cavaliers blow 21-point lead in Game 3 as LeBron James disappears

author:
Andrew Lynch                    

                                    
                        @andrewlynch
description: LeBron James hasn't played this poorly since he lost the NBA Finals to the Dallas Mavericks. What gives?
title: Here's why LeBron James is playing like it's the 2011 NBA Finals all over again

author:
Andre Vergara                    

                                    
                        @DreDay613
description: LeBron James had to sit with almost 7 minutes left in the half as the Boston Celtics led Game 4.
title: Watch LeBron James get whistled for his 4th foul in the first half -- for the first time in his career

author: Chris ForsbergESPN Staff Writer
description: While LeBron James and Kyrie Irving carried the Cavaliers after halftime, the Celtics couldn't respond, especially without their one true superstar.
title: Without Isaiah Thomas, Celtics crumble as Cavaliers' stars step up

author: Brian WindhorstESPN Senior Writer
description: Kyrie Irving scored at will against the Boston Celtics, saving the Cavaliers from LeBron James' foul trouble and ultimately putting a stamp on Game 4.
title: How Kyrie Irving dominated Game 4

author: Dave McMenaminESPN Staff Writer
description: LeBron James passed Michael Jordan as the NBA's all-time scoring leader in the playoffs with 2:40 left in the third quarter of Thursday's game against the Celtics.
title: LeBron passes MJ as all-time playoffs scorer
